reviewText: Clinton Anderson is one of the truly great horse trainers of our times. His instruction is easy to follow and he demonstrates his "Method" in simple and easy to follow directions. I love his books also, but when you watch the DVD you can really see the flow of the patterns between horse and trainer. He has pearls of wisdom to share with his audience done with gentle firmness and humor. Great series!
Anything you get and follow the advice from Clint Anderson is the best. Had horses for over 50 yrs. and he is the best.
Thank you Clinton. It teachers us alot about getting the most out of horses and us. The dvd was as it was expected.

A Very complete 3 Disc Instruction of how to get Respect from your horse. Covers all the ground work and Clinton Anderson explains everything as he works a problem horse in easy to understand way. I recommend it highly!

I like the way Clinton Anderson teaches. He makes it easy to understand and demonstrates what he's teaching while telling what he's doing and why, as well as giving tips that stay in your mind. I also like how he demonstrates with a person who's trying to teach her horse and they both are "green" at this, as it shows what common problems with the horse and the trainer can be and how to correct them. And then he shows the round penning exercise with his own trained horse so you can see what the results are when you follow his training. I just got a new round pen and am anxious to use what I've learned on these DVD's!
the item was just as the seller said it was. It was in like new conditionClinton Anderson -Round Penning- DVD 3 Disc DVD -Downunder Horsemanship - Parts 1 through 3 - horse training

Clinton Anderson is simply stunningly wonderful.  After watching the dvd, I went out and worked with my horse in the round pen.  Then, I came back and watched the dvd again; and I got tips for my specific situation.  Anderson is a wonderful, down to earth, chatty teacher.  SUPERB!
